subject: Deaths (Obituaries)
Billiards
lead_paragraph: Steve Mizerak, who sank his first pocket billiards shot at age 4, became a national champion while a full-time schoolteacher, then emerged as a pop-culture celebrity after doing television beer commercials.
snippet: Steve Mizerak, who sank his first pocket billiards shot at age 4, became a national champion while a full-time schoolteacher, then emerged as a pop-culture celebrity after doing television beer commercials.
